snippet: A closely watched indicator on manufacturing was corrected to show more strength than initially reported.
abstract: Stock market recovers from early jolt after widely watched indicator on manufacturing is corrected to show more strength than initially reported.
lead_paragraph: A closely watched indicator on manufacturing was corrected to show more strength than initially reported.

headline.main: Mistakes in Manufacturing Index Leave Market Queasy
headline.print_headline: Mistakes in Manufacturing Index Leave Market Queasy
